typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.SearchResult.ResultInfo
typeDescription.description: Meta-information on the retrieved search result

featureDescription.name: relevance
featureDescription.description: Relevance of the result; a metric between [0,1]

featureDescription.name: documentId
featureDescription.description: ID of the document (specific to data source)

featureDescription.name: isLast
featureDescription.description: Whether this is the last search result
